review: Fire TV is wonderful!  I gave up overpriced cable and now have Prime, HULU, and Netflix.  Fire TV makes it so easy to search and/or browse for movies and tv shows.  It was relatively easy to set up and learn to use.  If you subscribe to several services as I do, it is well worth the money.  And I really like the voice search feature. You won't be disappointed.
